tool_description: Extracts order data from ecommerce systems based on specified time ranges, order statuses, and filtering criteria to provide structured datasets for analysis.

start_date.description: Start date for order extraction in ISO 8601 format

end_date.description: End date for order extraction in ISO 8601 format

sales_channel.description: Filter by sales channel: web, mobile, marketplace, retail

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be earlier than end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps
Date range too large: Maximum allowed range is 2 years to prevent performance issues
Invalid order status: Use only [pending, processing, shipped, delivered, cancelled, returned]
Invalid sales channel: Use one of [web, mobile, marketplace, retail, all]
usage: Specify start_date and end_date, optionally filter by order_status array and sales_channel. Returns structured order data ready for analysis.

date_range.description: Actual date range of extracted data
